tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE arbitrage_trading (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    buy_price DECIMAL,
    sell_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    exchange_id UUID NOT NULL,
    trade_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    executed_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ExchangePrices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_id UUID REFERENCES ArbitrageExchange(id),
    currency_pair VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    buy_price DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    sell_price DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ArbitrageOpportunities (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_id UUID REFERENCES ArbitrageExchange(id),
    currency_pair VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    profit_margin DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    feasible BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Trades (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_id UUID REFERENCES ArbitrageOpportunities(id),
    trade_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 8) NOT NULL,
    executed_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_1 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    pair VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE exchange_2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    pair VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    pair VARCHAR(50),
    action VARCHAR(10),
    quantity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE arbitrage_opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pair VARCHAR(50),
    exchange_1_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    exchange_2_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    potential_profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
